root.name: Bratz: Fashion Boutique
root.description: OverviewBratz: Fashion Boutique is a game developed and published by Activision for the Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3DS platforms.QR CodesIf used in a Nintendo DSi or Nintendo 3DS system, players of Bratz: Fashion Boutique can unlock special in-game items by scanning QR Codes found on real world Bratz toys.
